§ Sabzii Inspirations

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The inspiration for the [[sabzii]] lineage from [[world-18]] includes:

• the **green sea slug** (also known as ** eastern emerald elysia**, or **elysia chlorotica**), which is a slug which uses chloroplasts they from algae that they eat to perform photosynthesis.
